name: ACM SIGMOD-SIGACT-SIGART Conference on Principles of Database Systems
information:
Conference dates: June 22-27, 2025
Year: 2025
Location: Berlin, Germany
City-State-Province: Berlin
Country: Germany
Continent: Europe
Type: Offline
FIRST SUBMISSION CYCLE Abstract deadline: May 31, 2024
FIRST SUBMISSION CYCLE Full paper submission deadline: June 7, 2024
SECOND SUBMISSION CYCLE Abstract deadline: December 2, 2024
SECOND SUBMISSION CYCLE Full paper submission deadline: December 9, 2024
FIRST SUBMISSION CYCLE Initial notification: August 12, 2024
FIRST SUBMISSION CYCLE Final notification: September 2, 2024
SECOND SUBMISSION CYCLE Initial notification: February 14, 2025
SECOND SUBMISSION CYCLE Final notification: March 7, 2025
Registration: {}
FIRST SUBMISSION CYCLE Rebuttal: July 29 - August 1, 2024
FIRST SUBMISSION CYCLE Revision submission: August 26, 2024
SECOND SUBMISSION CYCLE Rebuttal: February 3-7, 2025
SECOND SUBMISSION CYCLE Revision submission: February 28, 2025
Topics: Database systems, Data management
Publisher: ACM
summary: The ACM SIGMOD/PODS Conference is a leading international forum for database researchers, practitioners, developers, and users. The 2025 conference will be held in Berlin, Germany, from June 22-27, 2025. The conference features a technical program with research and industrial talks, tutorials, demos, workshops, and poster sessions.
callForPapers:
PODS 2025 invites scientific articles that present principled contributions to modeling, application, and system building in the context of data management. Key dates are:

*   **FIRST SUBMISSION PHASE:**
    *   Abstract: May 31, 2024
    *   Submission: June 7, 2024
    *   Rebuttal: July 29 - August 1, 2024
    *   Initial notification: August 12, 2024
    *   Revision submission: August 26, 2024
    *   Final notification: September 2, 2024
*   **SECOND SUBMISSION PHASE:**
    *   Abstract: December 2, 2024
    *   Submission: December 9, 2024
    *   Rebuttal: February 3-7, 2025
    *   Initial notification: February 14, 2025
    *   Revision submission: February 28, 2025
    *   Final notification: March 7, 2025

*   **Submission Guidelines:**
    *   Maximum length: 15 pages, not including references, plus unlimited space for references. Additional details may be included in a clearly marked appendix.
    *   Format: LaTex users must format their submission using the standard ACM "acmsmall" proceedings stylesheet.
    *   Double-anonymous reviewing will be applied.
*   **Publication:** Accepted papers will be published in a PODS 2025 issue of the PACMMOD journal.
